scripts.build: npm run clean && echo Using TypeScript && npx tsc --version && npx tsc --build && npx tsc-alias
scripts.major-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[major-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version major && npm publish && git push
scripts.major-release-candidate: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[major-release-candidate]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version premajor --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta && git push
scripts.minor-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[minor-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor-release-candidate: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[minor-release-candidate]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version preminor -preid rc && npm publish --tag beta && git push
scripts.next-release-candidate: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[next-release-candidate]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version prerelease --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta && git push
scripts.patch-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[patch-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.patch-release-candidate: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[patch-release-candidate]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version prepatch --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta && git push
scripts.pre-release: npm run build:add && git commit -m '[pre-release]' && git push --force-with-lease && npm version prerelease --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta && git push
